column4: i've been browsing the ubuntu site, and i had a question, is the default install a live install? can i download a DVD iso of an offline installation if so? I'm a SuSE user lookin for a change, n i wanted to try ubuntu, i was told to try ubuntu or fedora. every SuSE release I've downloaded a DVD with all the stuff rather than the live CD. much easier for me I think.
if you are using a liveCD, you will not need an internet connection (it is not "live" in the online sense) to complete the installation
LiveCD simply means that you can try the distribution out via the CD before actually committing to installing it
